author: cms-sw
body:
* libzmq: add explicit dependency on libunwind
* matplotlib: explicitly ask to use system freetype, i.e. not build it from source
* ROOT: update config.{sub,guess} for libAfterImage
* openmpi: explicitly configure to build it's own version of `pmix` (no version is installed on x86/arm machines, the version installed on RISC-V is not accepted because it's built with wrong libevent?)
title: Changes for RISC-V
